::Prowl/Hot Rod::

"That is correct," answers Prowl.

Hot Rod steps in.
"He has been in NBW longer then me. And he was the rightful person to
take command when the last commander left. Besides, I hate command. I
just usually get stuck with it."
When talking about the past commander, Hot Rod was careful. He did not
want to mention Iron Raptor around Prowl. Prowl had been through enough
when he lost her.
